website_summaries.verdict: Incorporating high manufacturing standards, quality ingredients, and a money-back guarantee, these daily-use capsules boast improved memory, mood, and motivation.
pros: Alpha GPC crosses the blood-brain barrier as a highly absorbable kind of choline
Users report feeling more alert and able to concentrate
Unlike other ADHD medications, this supplement allows for more restful sleep as well as more focused waking hours
cons: Those with allergies are out of luck - this kind of choline is derived from soy
Some users complain of stomach upset

customer_reviews.title: Caution - Side Effects
customer_reviews.text: I always start any new supplement with caution, so I took one capsule with food once per day, which is half the recommended dose. I have previously taken choline bitartrate without any issues. After three days, I tossed this out. I was experiencing brain fog, headaches, severe heartburn and stomach pain. I stopped the supplement and the fog and headaches disappeared within a day. The stomach issues took two weeks of Nexium to resolve. From the other reviews, it looks like this product works for most people. Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: rc

customer_reviews.title: Alpha GPC is Great!
customer_reviews.text: After reading an article about supplement recommendations for MTHFR mutations, which I have, I was intrigued about the importance of Choline. So, I started taking Double Wood Alpha GPC, and I was amazed with the results. Previous to taking Alpha GPC, I was becoming very forgetful, and I felt that my strength was fading. After taking the supplement for several weeks, I noticed my cognitive function improving, and my strength improved as well. I am very pleased with this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Croyle

customer_reviews.title: great for fatigue
customer_reviews.text: amazing! I have Postural Orthostatic Tacycardial Syndrome. I decided to take this for brain fog, little did I know it would also work wonderfully for my fatigue. apparently some people with POTS have a problem making use of choline. So that explains that. I take 1200mg in 600mg twice a day if needed. (sometimes I skip the second dose if I'm feeling well) planning on adding uridine to see if that helps further.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Start with 1/2 dose.. work your way up!
customer_reviews.text: Foggy head & fatigue if I take a full dose in the morning, but clear and focused if I spread it out 1/2 morning 1/2 evening.. highly recommend - Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Skipppy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟
customer_reviews.text: Remarkable success with Alpha GPC! I've been using it for a month now & have tried going on & off of it to be sure of the results. I highly recommend it. I'm stacking it with Uridine & Sulbutiamine now & getting astonishing results for my ADD, Mild Depression & mild PTSD. Cognitive skills are very much enhanced! Customer service is amazing. I've exchanged 3 emails with the (Owner? John) & gotten quick detailed replies from him.. I highly recommend this company!
customer_reviews.author: dilworthdude

customer_reviews.title: NOT A PURE PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product did NOT contain pure ingredients. I took it to a local lab and had it tested for purity. I had suspicions about the purity of the product after I began getting headaches with use. DO NOT BUY! YOU HAVE NO IDEA WHAT YOU ARE ACTUALLY INGESTING!
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Burning sensation
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken this about a month now and all of sudddn I started to have this burning sensation when I go to the bathroom first time in my life. I immediately stopped taking this pill which is the only pill I take except multi vitamins and fish oil. I cannot even return this because it’s been over a month. I would not recommend it to anyone Ps. I see this black metal inside of this pill. What is it!!! I would never put anything metallic into my body.
customer_reviews.author: P. Shin

customer_reviews.title: Pressure head pain and foggy
customer_reviews.text: Took this today. I didn't anticipate the extreme amount of pressure I felt on, in my head. I felt sleepy, confused, hot & could absolutely not get out of a dense fog in my brain. It was a horrible feeling and it took almost an entire day before that agony & pain to wear off. I took it at 8 am and the entire day has been dark and draining. I'm returning this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: High Hopes but no results
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this was gonna help. Took 2 pills, 3xs a day for 3-4 weeks and no change in memorization or cognitive function. I was hoping it would help boost remembering stuff on my exams but it didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: stonegyrl

customer_reviews.title: My brain seems to love this!... "6 stars?"
customer_reviews.text: My brain and I noticed obvious and positive effects the NEXT MORNING... it was a bit amazing, actually! Looking back, the term brain-fog seems quite appropriate... now that it feels that it has "lifted!" I've tried lots of brain supplements... in my experience, this is by far the best. This gets my 100% recommendation!! I'd say you have little to lose and MUCH to gain if you are like I was... ... believing it maybe was just a (74 year) old brain... and nothing much to do about it. PS.... This is a big deal to me!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should!
customer_reviews.text: I take this twice every day, typically in the morning with Double Wood's Uridine and my favorite coffee. Together, this gets me ready to roll for the next 5-6 hours upon which I take another Alpha GPC and Uridine (with or without a caffeine drink) to carry me the rest of the day. It brings a kinda focus that caffeine simply cannot (although together, you're talking about the perfect mental acuity, at least in my case), and as has served as a staple of my nootropic stack for college and everyday life. On top of all that, it's probably the cheapest Alpha GPC I've found on Amazon that does what it should.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Double Wood is the best price I've found for alpha gpc
customer_reviews.text: I picked up alpha gpc for its purported effects for weightlifting: increased strength and growth hormone production. I can't say anything about GH production and don't have have bloodwork that would indicate either way, but I can say that it definitely aids weight training. I take 600mg 30-60 minutes before a workout, and I do have some more "oomph", so to speak. I notice most that I can contract a little more intensely, and have the ability to squeeze out that last rep, and maybe one more! Double Wood is the best price I've found for alpha gpc, and if you're into weight training, give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: David Bowen

customer_reviews.title: This seems to be working, I'm just two days in
customer_reviews.text: I have been desperate to find an effective treatment for my ADD. After 40, the brain fog, procrastination, and lack of motivation were much worse and definitely negatively impacting life and work. So far, due to the warnings about headaches, I've only taken 300mg once a day, but I'm upping it today. About 20-30 minutes after taking this, both days I've jumped on a task I've long been avoiding. Getting away from "avoidance" is what I need most, and this helped. Ritalin had similar effects when I tried it but with intolerable side effects. I'm hoping that more doses keeps me productive through more of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Critic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Helps tremendously with brain fog/cognitive difficulties
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for almost 3 months and I have noticed a dramatic difference in my ability to retain and recall information. This is a game changer for me because I have Lupus SLE and Fibromyalgia which cause brain fog and cognitive difficulties. This product actually arrived a day early the first time I purchased it and on time the second time I purchased it. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Arnitha Masenheimer

customer_reviews.title: Part of my nootropic stack
customer_reviews.text: I am concerned about neurodegenerative issues and am getting older and learned about GPC. I also take uridine, sulbutiamine, pqq, and some other suppliments so it's hard to pinpoint which one helps but I sleep better now. This is no small thing, I have a terrible time either getting to sleep or staying asleep. I regularly sleep 5 hours straight now. As for the other benefits, only time will tell. I don't have morning brain fog like I used to, I think this is independent of my sleep. I will continue to take all 4 of what I consider my nootropic stack, I think they might work together.
customer_reviews.author: M. Costas

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do anything for me. I tried taking this different ways and still nothing. Sometimes I even felt more tired and had no energy. It did not help me with focusing at all. I tried giving it a chance to get in my system over a 3 week period.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J.

customer_reviews.title: Dont get any false hopes.
customer_reviews.text: Gives me an awful headache and doesn't seem to do anything at all. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I noticed is migraine type headaches. They were severe and did not respond to Tylenol or Advil. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: product works
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived as described and promised. Noticed on 1st dose improved mental energy. With continued use, improved mental acuity and cognitive function. Short term memory has been getting better daily. I have only taken this for 15 days, and I deal with Work Order numbers and part numbers and have been constantly having to go back and look. I'm now starting to retain it on first look.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Contains Gelatin and Soy
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why they need to put gelatin and of all things SOY in this product. I got this for help with necessary macros for maintaining T levels and I'm shocked to see they'd put Soy in it. Should just be Choline. Also, I can't eat Gelatin for religious reasons and so I am disturbed by its presence in this product. It's 2019, everyone does veg caps now.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It Really works
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, it works exactly like it says. I was really surprised how it helps me focus on what Im doing or learning. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who has trouble learning or processing new information that is being taught because there mind is constantly be distracted by 20 or more other stuff that are non significant at that time
customer_reviews.author: JCL

customer_reviews.title: Works for mental acuity
customer_reviews.text: These work. Or at least the group of supplements I take work. I am mainly concerned about mental acuity. My job is mental and high stress. Requires mental agility, fast thinking, and fast response time. I take these with resveratrol and also take tumeric curcumin with bioperin. My brother in evidence based medicine recommended them. Despite that, I gave them a try. Ha! Well he was right. It has taken several starts and stops for me to determine a correlation of my mental brilliance to maintaining my dose on my supplements. I don't like to take drugs, including supplements, but I cannot deny the results.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: A Jump-starter
customer_reviews.text: At the start of using the Alpha-GPC supplement, I started to feel my mind feeling a much more clear, but this effect became magnified when I stacked Alpha-GPC with the same brand Uridine and Huperzine-H products. The combination of these supplements somehow even triggered the retrieval of long-forgotten memories, where Uridine may have probably played a strong role. What I liked most about Alpha-GPC however, is that it somehow allowed me to re-start certain positive behavioral patterns that have led to the formation and reinforcement of good new habits, and this is all due in part to the jumpstart clarity of focus that Alpha GPC provides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps me with sleep.  Pairs well with racetams.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed any dramatic effects from taking Alpha GPC. I think I have had improved sleep quality since I started taking it though (one every other day). I've definitely noticed more dreams and have been waking up feeling more rested lately. Probably worth it for that alone. I haven't tracked my memory or noticed any differences in it. But I will say this supplement seems to be quality and pairs well with racetams and other nootropics that deplete choline reserves. Double wood has a good reputation and, as far as I can tell, delivers a high quality product made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W

customer_reviews.title: Causes headaches -  screws with my head/mindset - not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: There is certainly something about this product that isn't right; that doesn't add up. I'm quite sure all the benefits advertised of this product are inverted with me. It gives me mental fog, headache/migraine, lethargy, and was simply painful to test out when I got it. It also made me feel pretty sick. This probably isn't healthy either, be cautious with this company's products for your own safety please. I do use the magnesium l threonate they sell, because I get good effects with a cost-efficient dosage.
customer_reviews.author: quinther

customer_reviews.title: Improves Focus
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this for months and has noticed a bit of improvement in his ability to focus. His attention span has always been very short but lately it has been noticeably better. This is the only thing he has been taking in regards to trying to improve his brain functioning so it looks like it's working, and we'll keep ordering as long as it does!
customer_reviews.author: K Auclair

customer_reviews.title: Great Choline based product for improving cognitive performance
customer_reviews.text: Alpha GPC is a highly bioavailable form of Choline that passes the blood brain barrier. It is helpful for college students or anyone who is interested in improving their cognitive performance with emphasis on improving memory retrieval, processing, and storing information. I have had good experience with Doublewood Supplements, and this Alpha GPC appears to be the real stuff.
customer_reviews.author: JKing

customer_reviews.title: Really Amazing, seriously....
customer_reviews.text: I'm 54 and my husband and I noticed a decline in my memory and mental sharpness. I tried this and it's been amazing. I focus better, remember better and have more energy and stamina. I guess the physical effect because of the mental energizing. I feel like my 'old self plus I have no side effects. If you're on the fence just try it and you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Mental Clarity Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular brand of Alpha GPC Choline on the suggestion of a buddy of mine who was experimenting with various supplements in search of a less expensive alternative to Onnit's Alpha Brain. We figured out that taking 2 tablets of Alpha GPC Choline along with 2 tablets of Double Wood's Huperzine-A daily did pretty much exactly the same thing as Alpha Brain, for far less money. The mental super-clarity lasts all day long and feels like having morning coffee without the caffeine hangover once it fades. I would highly recommend Huperzine-A to anyone, especially those of us who have to remain razor sharp all day.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Leighton

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for many months. I use it because it simply works . My mind feels faster and sharper. As a motorcyclist, that is priceless. In general, it's very nice. I feel like it's helping me while I'm learning a new language, too. I takeit with Rhodiola Rosea
customer_reviews.author: Amad Demetrious

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with my purchase of Alpha GPC from 'Double Wood ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with my purchase of Alpha GPC from 'Double Wood Supplements.' I use also use their Uridine supplement but haven't branched out from their product line, until the company I usually order Alpha GPC ran out of stock. I find no faults in Uridine I take from 'Double Wood Supplements' and felt I'd receive the same quality with their Alpha GPC, and I did, it's a high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: It helped with my Lyme brain
customer_reviews.text: After researching the benefits of Alpha GPC I decided to give it a try. I went with this brand because of the price and I was not disappointed. I am recovering from Lyme disease and have a lot of brain fog and mental confusion as a result. Also, I take antihisamines for allergies which are anticholinergic so I wanted to supplement for choline. This product helped clear up the brain fog and give better focus. I will continue to take them.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Works for Me. Excellent Costumer Service
customer_reviews.text: Works for me. I found myself increased my speech speed. It is always good to become more articulate. I found this in wikipedia: "Proper storage methods need to be used with alpha-GPC and include removing all air from the container, double bagging with plastic bags rated for chemicals (less likely to leak air), and storing bulk/excess inside the freezer"
customer_reviews.author: Lady J.M.

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE SIDE EFFECTS - AVOID!!
customer_reviews.text: Product ALWAYS gives me awful brain fog, fatigue, headaches, lethargy, depression. They offer free products for good reviews so don’t fall for all the good reviews. Read all the other 1 star reviews and see what I’m talking about. Garbage product
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: I feel that it would be best to take maybe half and see how you feel
customer_reviews.text: I try not to take too much of this in fear of building up a tolerance. I have also noticed that the first time I took a whole capsule, I felt kind of tired a few hours later. With that said, I feel that it would be best to take maybe half and see how you feel. I don't know if it's the supplement or something else, but I did feel more focused and did more laps in the pool when I took it before. I wouldn't take it all the time, but it's something nice to have as a back up focus booster.
customer_reviews.author: Rushi Dave

customer_reviews.title: Alpha GPC Choline Is The Real Deal !
customer_reviews.text: This product is the real deal! I do not label many things that. I have NO IDEA what exactly it is, or why it works, i just know it bloody works mkay??? What does it do, you ask? It very much, very powerfully makes you more alert. But its a beauty because i have witnessed no downside. No edginess, no anxiety, no sleeplessness. (Im looking at you caffeine!) Alpha GPC Choline, in short, is the shiznit yo...
customer_reviews.author: Sergeant tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products that works in the background to other supplements but without it, you would not get the full health benefits. This brand of Alpha-GPC is exceptionally good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product for great price
customer_reviews.text: great product for great price! ive been in supplement industry for 20+ years. started working at GNC in high school. i know my supps! dont need to do a lot of research on which alpha gpc to buy, i already did it. and this is the one i use. you will not be dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth s.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: I am writing to let you know about my experience using your product. I have the MTHFR gene, two variant copies, and I also had four pregnancies spaced closely together. Using your product has helped me to regain mental clarity and a boost of needed energy. Most importantly your product has helped all four of my baby's brain development inside and out of the womb. I have nursed all my children for at least a year and they are excelling in school and ahead of many in their class. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Heartburn result...
customer_reviews.text: I took one dose of this supplement today, but I don’t believe I’m going to be able to take it. It has nothing to do with the product’s quality. Quite simply, it gave me horrendous heartburn to the point of feeling nauseous. I see so many great reviews from others who had more positive experiences from it, so mine may not be common.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Helps some Lupus symptoms and brain fog
customer_reviews.text: I have lupus and brain fog is an everyday thing, since I have started taking Alpha GCP I have noticed a difference on the thinking level, and now i have the "wanting to get things done" mentality. Also great and fast and caring customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: VCSC

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Customer - Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat customer. I used the Alpha GPC in conjunction with Piracetam. I read on the internet that the Alpha GPC would help diminish headaches associated with Piracetam. While taking the two together, I never suffered from a headache and my test scores increased.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Focus and concentration
customer_reviews.text: I am a software developer so I spend many hours a day in front of my computer. It takes a lot of focus and concentration on my part. I purchased this to see if my focus could be improved and it has. I take this with my daily vitamins in the morning before I go to work. I've also noticed that I'm more social when I take this product. It opens this introvert up for better conversations. Hope it works for you too!
customer_reviews.author: James Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Made me feel depressed
customer_reviews.text: This isn't necessarily a problem with this specific brand, all alpha-gpc may do this to me for all I know. I've heard of it happening in others, and low and behold, every time I took this supplement I became incredibly depressed, sad, miserable. It would go away once it was out of my system, and I'd be fine as long as I didn't take it. Just be cautious.
customer_reviews.author: Brain Health

customer_reviews.title: Great Product To Improve Your Life
customer_reviews.text: My doctor suggested I take Alpha GPC for my fatty liver condition, and after taking it for a month I noticed not only was it helping with my fatty liver, I notice that my memory was improving as well. I would highly recommend this product and this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Clean focus no more mental fog
customer_reviews.text: I've tried alpha GPC before and was looking to purchase again when I came across double wood supplements during my search on amazon. I saw they are 3rd party inspected and had a great price so decided to order. Been taking it for about 2 weeks now along with their huperzine a and my focus is amazing especially when taken with my preworkout drink or a cup of coffee on my rest days. Double Wood you are doing it right and have won me over will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: orlando reyna

customer_reviews.title: Improvements in mental focus and clarity!
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement! Definitely noticed an improvement in mental focus and clarity. Even though I started taking this for cognitive benefits alone, I have noticed improvements in my stamina at the climbing gym and better recovery. I started with 1/day for a few days and now take between 2-3/day (making sure to not take it too late, as it will keep me up). The only downside to this is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Smiths

customer_reviews.title: Headache side effect
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical purchasing this product given that there weren't any reviews that were not "verified purchases" but I ended up getting it. Suffice it to say that after taking one pill I have a nasty headache which at least a couple of other reviewers have mentioned has occurred to them. Will not be continuing.
customer_reviews.author: SamB

customer_reviews.title: Causes allergy symptoms
customer_reviews.text: Whether it's due to soy or some other ingredients in processing, I can not take this supplement. For some reason, whenever I take it I get a lot of phlegm and post nasal drip causing lots of throat clearing which eventually developed into lung inflammation and cough.
customer_reviews.author: LAP

customer_reviews.title: It works. Play with dose.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many nootropics. Everyone is different so you'll have to experiment with doses, timing, and combos. Combos can get very expensive. So far, Alpha GPC worked the best so I have it on Subscribe and Save for the slight discount. Of course, it'd be better if it could be more affordable. The standard dose makes me sleepy/sluggish. Half the dose (1 capsule) gets me dialed in. I can feel an increase in clarity after 30-60 minutes depending on how much food I ate. Coffee is still needed in the morning. They make a great pair.
customer_reviews.author: 1nvest3d

customer_reviews.title: Quality & No Fillers
customer_reviews.text: I like Double Wood products because they're Pharmaceutical Grade & don't use fillers. Alpha GPC Choline is important to me because I take antihistamines which reduce natural levels of brain choline.
customer_reviews.author: fngrpntr

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: Alpha GPC is great for memory enhancement and helps me stay focused all day. I've been taking GPC every morning for years, but had issues with other distributers taking it off the market or marking up costs. I even tried ordering bulk powder, but found it to be a nuisance to portion out. I started ordering from DWS a few months ago and haven't looked back! They provide a perfect product that's already separated into pre-measured capsules, and it's cheaper than most competitors! I would absolutely recommend DWS as your first source for Alpha GPC.
customer_reviews.author: John Wilder

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Aloha, I am a registered nurse with adult protective services. A large percentage of my patients have cognitive decline. While researching Nootropics, I discovered Doublewood. I am so glad I stumbled upon your products. I am impressed with Alpha GPC. So, much so, I purchased the uridine magnesium T, and CDP Choline. usually taking vitamins and supplements do not show noticeable results. I can testify: my cognition has improved. My wife is impressed: " I notice you stopped asking me where your wallet and keys are."
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Severe Headaches
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 days of taking I started to get lingering all day headache. On the 3rd day the headache was extreme with massive throbbing in the rear of the brain. I stopped taking and headache was gone by the next day. I was on a different supplement and thought maybe it was due to that. I stopped taking the other supplement, waited a full week and then started this again. Same result, on the 3rd day or taking severe fog and a throbbing headache on the back of the head. Attempted to receive a refund but already past the return day. Was very hopeful this product would yield the positive results others had but bad side affects for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Shugarts

customer_reviews.title: Just took it
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ate too much in one meal and felt like about passing out until I decided to take this for the first time. I took it and started to move around and suddenly don't feel so heavy and foggy. It might be a coincidence but I'm going to keep experimenting and see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Aliasa

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Okay, as someone who has taken prescription stimulants for years, I am surprised by how well this stuff works. Obviously, this won’t feel exactly like prescription anything so don’t get your hopes up too high, but out of everything I tried this is the best hands down. Don’t be alarmed if it takes an extra 15-30 minutes to start working the first time you take it. No jitters, just clear, calm, focus that gets your head and body going strong. Overall, it gets the job done without the headaches and fog that typically comes with these types of supplements. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: This product does work and is of high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Doublewood supplements are a great value and quality. Just received a free bottle of Alpha GPC from Doublewood thru my Facebook page. I personally have used they're products multiple times and they seem to do what they say are supposed to. Alpha GPC helps with fogginess and clarity of thought especially in fast paced environments . Seems to keep stress level low and creates a fluidity in thought processes and recall of information no side effects easy on your stomach. It's a solid product and it works. Thanks again Doublewood Supplements.
customer_reviews.author: tscrp30

customer_reviews.title: Best mental support I have tried, but do not take frequently for max. benefits.
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff on a daily basis. I also have ADHD and occasionally use vyvanse to help focus, however, I honestly prefer to use these and no additional supplements. I am more focused, relatable and present in conversations, and it’s easier to articulate which has always been an issue for me, especially when my mind bounces everywhere. Absolutely abide by these supplements, however, you do build up a tolerance. So unless I take them every other week or every couple of days, you won’t receive the amazing maximum benefits. I recommend using only when you have a lot of diversified tasks to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Malzacher

customer_reviews.title: ... 3 days and had to stop after developing the worse migraine headache that lasted 4 days after I stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: I only used this for 3 days and had to stop after developing the worse migraine headache that lasted 4 days after I stopped using the product. The first day I took it I did notice an increase in mental focus and clarity as well as more stamina in my workouts. Unfortunately this was not enough to warrant a massive headache that laughed at Aleve and Tylenol. I did some research (which I wish I had done before buying this) and found out that many people experience headaches while using this product. It's not worth the money to have to deal with that kind of pain.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Alertness & Clarity in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This supplement has helped me with attention, focus, motivation & clarity. It’s given me the drive I’ve needed on “sleepy” mornings & has helped to maintain my alertness throughout the day without the jittery feeling caffeine brings. This will be a go to for me and I only plan to use it on my most busy days so my body doesn’t get too used to the supplement and make it not effective.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan R Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: I take Double Wood Alpha-GPC along with Uridine daily. Both work phenomenally. Together they have enhanced my cognitive ability. I have been taking them both for about five months and truly noticed a difference since day one. My friend was taking Alpha-GPC and Uridine and suggested I give it a try. I'm so happy I did! I'm interested in trying some of Double Wood's other products in the near future as well.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. BARACUS

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to let you know about my experience using Doublewood’s Alpha GPC supplement. My family doctor had mentioned the use or rather lack of choline in my diet. I was a little skeptical at first about consuming it. As weeks went by after purchasing my first bottle I began to feel more energetic on my day to day activities and focused on my tasks at work (IT). I was impressed at how I felt combining a great diet and the GPC supplement. Also I have fatty liver and choline helps with it. I chose the product based on so many good reviews and experiences on the Amazon website.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe R

customer_reviews.title: A clean, quality product that works as expected
customer_reviews.text: It is not a cure-all or miracle supplement, but it has increased my memory some and definitely helps with lucid dreaming. I have noticed a slight increase in my work capacity during exercise as well. You could spend more to get supplements that have just a little bit of choline or you could get the real deal for a good price. Buy this if you're thinking about supplementation is in the latter category.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Hard on my stomach don't know if it works or not. I took with Food
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Hope this works!
customer_reviews.text: We have just started these supplements, but they seem to perform as expected. I want to give it a month or so to see if it helps me. The service from the company and the quality of the product is completely satisfactory and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Koop

customer_reviews.title: Synergizes well with other nootropics but great by itself too
customer_reviews.text: If only there was more than 30 servings per bottle! That is my only complaint. Double Wood supplements is GMP Quality certified and even offers their certificate of analysis for their products. Anecdotally, I have noticed I am able to connect the dots more often, and I have a smooth / calm mental state after taking 1 serving every day for a week. Alpha GPC has been shown to help facilitate other important transmitters in the brain, and essentially acts as a lubricant for your brain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improves short-term memory, focus, and mental energy
customer_reviews.text: I’m 63 years old and very pleased with the results I’ve achieved taking Alpha-GPC these past several months. My ability to focus has improved immensely, particularly through the long days at work, and my short-term memory is noticeably better as well. I notice a drop in my level of mental energy whenever I forget to take my Alpha-GPC for a couple of days - it really makes a difference. Five star product!
customer_reviews.author: billybangdouglas

customer_reviews.title: Alpha GPC didn't quite work for me (felt overly drowsy) ...
customer_reviews.text: Alpha GPC didn't quite work for me (felt overly drowsy), but different supplements work for different people. The reason I'm providing a five star review is for the customer service. A representative from Double Wood supplements refunded me in full and informed me to keep the remaining Alpha-GPC for my continued use. I will definitely be looking to purchase different supplements from Double Wood.
customer_reviews.author: Theo S.

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it’s not working for us
customer_reviews.text: My 59-year-old husband was recently diagnosed with early stages of dementia and we were advised that supplements were encouraged in his daily diet so far I do not see a difference with this supplement which she has been taking for about two months now he is still disoriented and confused I know everyone reacts differently to different supplements this is not the one for us good luck to all you others
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Effective beyond my highest hopes.
customer_reviews.text: To be clear: I had an undiagnosed genetic need for supplemental choline. I figured I’d buy this, and at the worst I’d be out $20. What I got was a whole new brain. I’m sure that this won’t do for everyone what it did for me, but if you need choline, this is clearly a solid product. Within a week of use, the anxiety and depression that have plagued me for my entire life dissolved, leaving me more “space” in my brain than I’ve ever known.
customer_reviews.author: No'a bat Miri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent supplement to enhance Neuro activity of the brain.
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing negative to say concerning this supplement. I used it in combination with Uridine and Aniracetam as advised by my doctor who is using NeuroField to treat a brain injury. After 3 months of using these supplements I began seeing positive changes in my thinking where I had not with NeuroField alone. I would recommend these supplements even without NeuroField, because of the enhancement in how my brain is working. I'm still under treatment and will continue to use these supplements without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: it is best to focus on diet and adequate sleep first
customer_reviews.text: These supplements help my mind feel clear and less foggy, and I definitely need help with that. As with most supplements, it is best to focus on diet and adequate sleep first, and then add supplements that help your weak areas.
customer_reviews.author: jdh

customer_reviews.title: Less Brain Fog!
customer_reviews.text: I've been with serious immune issues: leaky gut, candida, sibo, etc. and my brain fog has gotten progressively worse. I had luck with Choline and a few other things earlier this year, but then it didn't help as much. I felt the different in 36 hours, if not sooner. Will be subscribing on this one. FYI - I'm 29, active/fit, eating Paleo and the brain fog was/is incredibly concerning. while i work to get to the root, this definitely helps! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Hall

customer_reviews.title: Enhances Focus, Energy levels, and Cognitive Acuity
customer_reviews.text: I use this product daily in order to supplement myself with sustainable energy levels to get through each day. The pharmaceutical mechanisms of this compound induce an increase of memory enhancing benefits. It is just what you need if you like to read or write stories. It helps you organize your thoughts by its mechanisms on short term memory. I highly recommend it to the erroneous youth who often get bogged down by arduous schoolwork! -Christian
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Thornberry

customer_reviews.title: One of My Favorite Supplements
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what makes this a beginner Nootropic other than its easy to spend $100s creating stacks. I spend a ton on supplements and believe many are largely placebo long-term (including the very expensive stacks). That said, Alpha GPC is more than that IMO, and Double Wood's Alpha GPC provides a much better mental and physical boost than other brands as well as drastically more expensive alternatives I've tried - especially long term. Would definitely recommend this supplement more than most!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just made me sleep
customer_reviews.text: These didn't do anything for my memory or focus at all. All they did was make me tired. Figured maybe it was me so gave my adult daughter one (she has ADHD) and the same thing happened to her. If they weren't open, I'd send them back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: AlanAndMel

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for mental boost and clarity!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely noticed less brain fog and more mental clarity and energy throughout the day. Would also recommend stacking this with Alpha Lipoic Acid, NADH, Rhodiola Rosea for energy and motivation. You can also stack with ancient ayurvedic herbs for anxiety/stress such as Ashwagandha, Bacopa Monnieri and Lion's Mane Mushroom.
customer_reviews.author: Emyli

customer_reviews.title: Helps my focus & memory without adverse side effects!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this last month. I’m in Med school and this has been a life saver!! It helps me stay focused and retain information without making me anxious or jittery. I usually only use it on exam days, but I’m thinking of using it more :)
customer_reviews.author: Amwaj Blizzard

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product to stack with piracetam.
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked great as a stacked supplement with piracetam. Piracetam van cause headaches on its own. With this brand of choline, the headaches don't come. I get Herat energy and focus with this product. Price is good, shipping is fast. I will continue to use this product. Only thing I would like to see is to have a larger size bottle available on Amazon. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering, I love it! I noticed improved concentration and memory, it’s easy to swollow and doesn’t upset my stomach. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie a parker

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the results!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Alpha-GPC because of a recommendation from my co-worker, and have been happy with the results. The benefits of increasing acetylcholine levels has been popping up repeatedly in my news feeds and podcasts as , so I was already primed to give it a try. I've noticed a boost in focus during the week while I'm taking the supplement, and it feels like my memory is better (even if it's a placebo effect, I'm happy for the additional boost!). There is a noticeable difference on the weekends when I'm not taking it, so I am happy with the results. I will definitely add this into my neuro-stack rotation!
customer_reviews.author: Bob L. Desilets Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Genetic Deficiency made me do it
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I heard supplementing with Choline can really help with brain fog and cognitive performance. It did help! I feel the difference when I am consistently supplementing during my Doctorate program and helped improve my study time. It turns out that I had a genetic Deficiency where I cannot produce my own choline. I have to get it from outside sources. This is my outside source now and I make sure I always have a bottle with me.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Covarrubias

customer_reviews.title: Increased Focused & Digestion of Information
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product a few times now and it is a quality product. I originally used it for focus during lifting and saw an improvement on my focus on technique. Interestingly, that same focus carried with me for the remainder of the day. This has been great to use when I need to intake a large amount of information in one day and retain a majority of the knowledge. Additionally, I can see an improvement in my ability to understand, process, and communicate about a subject when I have taken this product. Would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been studying for my exams and needed a booster. This product almost had me die. Everytime i took it i would feel like running short of breath , as if i am about to pass out. I could feel my heart weakening . Be very careful consuming this . I have a lost of pills left and i wish i could get my money back
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDINE

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement.
customer_reviews.text: I want to start with a caveat, I've never taken this by itself, always as a supplement to a racetam. Unfortunately, I've never gotten much of an effect from racetams despite trying several, but the Alpha GPC seems just fine and I have no complaints about this brand whatsoever. I've also communicated with the company through email and they were a pleasure to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: M. King

customer_reviews.title: Have seen results
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my husband who suffered a traumatic brain injury over a year ago from a car accident to help with brain function and repair based on research I have done. He reports after three weeks feeling better clarity and is able to remember things better. I have too noticed this in him. I will give an update in a month. Package arrived promptly and well packaged. I would buy supplements from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlye

customer_reviews.title: This product works and it works quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have been taking Ketone products to help my memory function. They were unpleasant to take, and also very expensive. I read about choline and found your product. I am on my second bottle, and hope to continue this in my forever as long as that lasts. I have noticed an increase in my memory. It is also very affordable. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Beverli Eagan

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product info..
customer_reviews.text: Beware product description says soy free.. product is not soy free as it states on the bottle..
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works great for busy people!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a mother of two little ones, have a part time job and own a business... I can use all the help I can get with energy and motivation. I definitely noticed a difference when taking this product. I would take 1-2 in the morning and 1-2 in the afternoon if needed. I was a little nervous I might be wired, but it wasn’t anything like that - just helped focus. Will definitely be re-ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Awful customer service, product doesn’t work, buy at your own risk!
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: Clarity Increased, Decreased Sweating
customer_reviews.text: I tired ALPHA GPC recently for the first time after reading about possible symptoms of a choline efficiency (Excessive sweating, brain fog etc). Im happy to report that after a few weeks of use I noticed improvement in these areas. Definitely worth checking out! And of course do you research/talk to doctor before trying a new supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie43

customer_reviews.title: I take it mainly to offset the effects of nootropics like piracetam, aniracetam and carphedon (phenyl-piracetam) which are suppo
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason this is the best-selling brand of Alpha GPC. It's the cheapest and it's made in the USA. I take it mainly to offset the effects of nootropics like piracetam, aniracetam and carphedon (phenyl-piracetam) which are supposed to deplete choline.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: One of my mandatory supplements
customer_reviews.text: I originally took these prior to my workouts, to boost GH levels, but I am now taking them on a daily basis, for the cognitive benefits as well. Big name brands that are supposed to help with memory and cognition can be expensive. I use alpha- gpc and phosphatidyl serine and feel like I am sharper than ever. I have also maintained my strength levels at the same levels as 20 years ago. It's like I've stopped aging. I can still do 30 pull-ups and I am 58 now, and rock climbing as good as "back in the day".
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Elimination of headaches from using other nootropics
customer_reviews.text: While I do notice a slight increase in energy/focus from isolated use, it's in conjunction with other nootropics (racetams specifically) where this GPC shines. Taking a capsule prior (20 or so minutes) to taking a racetam completely eliminated the headaches I used to get from them. If you're considering using this by itself it's worth giving it a shot, but if experiencing any side effects of racetams it's basically necessary. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: MShinkle1040

customer_reviews.title: High quality, bioactive choline supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking a choline supplement for years to ensure adequate intake of this essential nutrient. This particular supplement is a premium, highly bioavailable form of choline to ensure that I can optimize my neurological function. This form of choline is preferable because it does not require hepatic processing to be actively utilized. While I haven't noticed drastic results, it is likely because I have been supplementing for years and am not at a deficit. I would recommend this supplement to round out adequate intake.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelmina Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Helps with cognative functions
customer_reviews.text: I take ALPHA-GPC to improve my memory, recall, and cognition. It helps do all those things. I also take it to improve my brain functions in general. I especially like to take it before a test or meetings. Wish the price was better though.
customer_reviews.author: Jim99

customer_reviews.title: Supplement which didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: The 3rd supplement I bought together with 2 others made by same company. I researched well, but these supplements just didn't work for me. Maybe I didn't give them enough time. It's possible. But I felt nothing.
customer_reviews.author: J.barker

customer_reviews.title: Like most vitamins or supplements it's hard to really tell ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work. Like most vitamins or supplements it's hard to really tell exactly how well they're actually working or exactly what they're doing inside you. I seem to be at least a little more awake or conscious than before I started Alpha GPC along with a group of these types of supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cee

customer_reviews.title: Great way to maximize mental focus
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on recommendation from my brother, and I'm very happy with it. I keep a bottle in my desk at work all the time, and use it nearly every day. I feel that it helps me get into an efficient workflow where I can get a lot of work done without distraction. Over time of taking 2 capsules every day, I've noticed that my memory has improved as well - and I mix up numbers in my head a lot less as well. Overall, wonderful product and nothing bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Householder

customer_reviews.title: This amazing supplement just breathes new life into a foggy brain
customer_reviews.text: It's only been a few days and I already feel way different! This amazing supplement just breathes new life into a foggy brain. Great after I've been sleep deprived for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Howard

product_meta.title: Alpha GPC Choline Supplement (Beginner Nootropic for Brain Support, Focus, Memory, Motivation, and Energy) Pharmaceutical Grade, Made in USA (60 Capsules 300mg)
product_meta.description: According to the American College of Nutrition up to 90% of Americans are deficient in choline and it is recommended to supplement with a choline product. Alpha GPC is the most bioavailable form of Choline. This means it crosses the blood brain barrier more easily than other choline supplements and is most effective and replenishing choline levels. Optimizing choline levels may lead to improved cognitive function and increased motivation. Double Wood Supplement’s Alpha GPC is manufactured in New York city and tested for purity right here in the USA.Please note this product is derived from soy and those with a soy allergy should not consume it.
feature_bullets: PROMOTE CHOLINE LEVELS - Alpha GPC is a highly bioavailable form of Choline which helps support healthy Choline levels
SUPPORT YOUR MEMORY - Remember more information for your exams, forget less deadlines at work, no more losing your car keys
SUPPORT ACETYLCHOLINE SYNTHESIS- Nootropics supplement to support memory, focus, and acetylcholine levels
MADE IN THE USA - Our Alpha GPC is manufactured right here in the USA
SAFETY TESTED IN THE USA - Double Wood's Alpha GPC is safety tested for heavy metals and microbes in New York
